name: Chungus Rampage in Big Forest
storyline:
Big Chungus is living in the forest. Chungus world is not complete with cows, other big chungus, a home, a farm and all those things that are needed for survival. 
 
Chungus is starting his new life in a forest he has built his cottage, constructed farm to harvest, he has some cows to care and take milk from them. In this tiny chungus home he has enemies and he has to be prepared for their attacks. 
 
Survival of chungus is your goal, you might have to play rampage to survive. Let's begin the journey of chungus.
summary: Chungus Rampage in Big Forest is a 3rd-Person action game in which Big Chungus wreaks havoc on a farm in order to survive.
